thread.title: Residents fight new homes plans amid housing crisis
thread.title_full: Residents fight new homes plans amid housing crisis - BBC News

author: BBC
title: Residents fight new homes plans amid housing crisis
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Residents fight new homes plans amid housing crisis 22 October 2015 Last updated at 23:00 BST
Campaigners in Saffron Walden in Essex have formed their own political party to oppose a new housing project.
Experts say that not enough new homes are being built to meet demand in the UK.
One difficulty is that local communities - such as the dissenters in Saffron Walden - often oppose new developments, as Reeta Chakrabarti reports.
